trans-unit.source: Contains a list of possible states for the audio input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关语音识别引擎的音频输入的可能状态的列表。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the audio input state of the speech recognition engine with the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取语音识别引擎使用的音频输入的状态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events are raised when the audio input state of a speech recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>音频输入的语音识别引擎更改状态时将引发事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Receiving silence or non-speech background noise.
trans-unit.target: 接收的静默或非语音背景噪音。
